title: Single of The Week: The Beta Band – Needles in My Eyes
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/thebetaband.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/thebetaband.jpg)

**Crack in The Road** usually picks a new release for its single of the week, however as this tune rolled onto my iPod at 4am through the wonders of shuffle, I knew I had to share it with you. **The Beta Band’s** _‘Needles In My Eyes’_ is what most would describe as a hidden gem, melancholic to an extreme but also oddly uplifting and resilient; this is perhaps the most worthy single of the week we’ve  had so far.

[Download Needles in My Eyes](http://rapidshare.com/files/383113064/12_Needles_In_My_Eyes.mp3)

[Offical Site](http://www.betaband.com/)
